result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Brian Keith Glover Jr not in court, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III in court for Brian Keith Glover Jr.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. 
Defense in receipt of discovery and offer from the State and request a plea and sentencing date. 
Defense advised to file the plea documents 24 hours in advance of the hearing,. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 26, 2023 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Brian Keith Glover Jr not in court, in custody.  
Attorney Fred Richardson III in court for Brian Keith Glover Jr. 

ADJOURNED OFF THE RECORD: Case in court for Scheduling Conference. 
Defense in receipt of discovery  from the State and request a time to discuss with defendant
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Crivello.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Kori Ashley, Br. 19.

Defendant Brian Keith Glover in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Brian Keith Glover in custody at Racine Correctional.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Brian Keith Glover appeared by video means with Attorney.  Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of case #15CF3999. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer M. Abdulghani. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 19.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Request for Substitution of Judge.  Received and Filed.  nk

Attorney Fred Richardson in court, defendant Brian Keith Glover not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR IN PERSON. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. Mr Glover has been moved from Dodge to Racine. He's not scheduled to appear by video for todays proceedings. Defense moves to dismiss. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Fred Richardson in court, defendant Brian Keith Glover not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Defendant does not appear by video from Dodge. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.
DNA Notice of Intent to Use; filed.

Attorney Fred Richardson in court, appear by video, defendant Brian Keith Glover not in court, in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Defendants appearance is waived. Defense moves to dismiss; motion is denied. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Brian Keith Glover not in court, defendant in custody. Abby Rockendorf appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Dodge Corrections did not produce defendant.
Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Brian Keith Glover not in court, defendant in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is a witness in a trial. Attorney Richardson is in trial. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Brian Keith Glover in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Brian Keith Glover in custody.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Brian Keith Glover appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
